After a liver biopsy, you should rest for the remainder of the day. You should avoid heavy lifting and strenuous exercise for the next few days. You may also have some pain at the biopsy site, which can be managed with over-the-counter pain relievers.
Can I eat normally?
Yes, you can eat normally. However, you should avoid alcohol for the next 24 hours.
How long does it take to recover from a liver biopsy?
Most people are able to resume their normal activities within a few days. However, you should avoid heavy lifting and strenuous exercise for the next few days.
What should I do if I experience any pain or bleeding?
If you experience any severe pain or bleeding, you should contact your doctor immediately. However, some mild pain and bruising at the biopsy site is normal and should go away on its own.
